cloud_readiness.summary: Application is well-architected for cloud deployment with modern Spring Boot 3.x and cloud-native patterns
strengths: Modern Spring Boot 3.4.1 with Jakarta EE support
Spring Cloud Azure integration for MySQL
concerns: Eager fetch type on ManyToMany relationship could impact performance at scale
Cache configuration may need tuning for production
Database initialization scripts require migration planning

issues.title: Eager Fetch Type in Entity Relationships
issues.description: The Vet entity uses FetchType.EAGER for the specialties relationship, which could cause N+1 query problems at scale
issues.recommendation: Consider using FetchType.LAZY with explicit fetch joins in queries where needed

issues.title: External Configuration Dependency
issues.description: Application depends on Config Server for configuration, which must be available during startup
issues.recommendation: Ensure Config Server high availability or use 'optional:' prefix for fallback behavior (already implemented)

issues.title: Database Migration Strategy
issues.description: Application includes raw SQL scripts for HSQLDB and MySQL initialization that may need migration management
issues.recommendation: Consider using Flyway or Liquibase for production database schema versioning and migration

issues.title: Distributed Tracing
issues.description: Distributed tracing (Sleuth) is commented out in favor of Azure App Insights
issues.recommendation: Ensure Azure Application Insights is properly configured for distributed tracing in production

issues.title: No Authentication/Authorization
issues.description: REST endpoints are not protected with Spring Security
issues.recommendation: Implement Spring Security with OAuth2/JWT for production deployments

issues.title: Circuit Breaker Pattern
issues.description: No circuit breaker or retry logic for external service calls
issues.recommendation: Consider adding Resilience4j for circuit breaker, retry, and bulkhead patterns when calling external services

azure.database: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server (already configured via spring-cloud-azure-starter-jdbc-mysql)
azure.service_discovery: Azure Spring Apps built-in Eureka or Azure Service Bus
azure.config_management: Azure App Configuration or Azure Key Vault
azure.estimated_effort: LOW to MEDIUM - Application is already Azure-ready with Azure Spring Cloud dependencies

recommendations: Application is cloud-native ready with 12-factor principles
Health checks are configured via Actuator
Stateless design with external cache and database

next_steps: Optimize JPA fetch strategies for production scale
Implement circuit breaker pattern for resilience
Test with Azure Spring Apps or target cloud platform
